name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer building AI agents and developer tooling
bio: I'm an Engineering Manager at FireGroup, where I lead teams building scalable backend systems.
Outside work, I build tools that make developers' lives better. My projects span AI tooling (MCP connectors, Claude plugins), real-time systems, and productivity tools.

Started aiocean.io as a sandbox for AI agent experimentation. Built obsidian-open-gate (221 stars) to integrate web APIs with Obsidian, jira-mcp (78 stars) for AI-Jira interaction, and instantCode (51 stars) for AI-powered browser inspection.
I write about software engineering and side projects at 12bit.vn and document my 1% daily improvement journey at onepercent.plus.
Back in 2016, I co-founded the Vue.js Vietnam community when Vue was just getting started.
I believe in shipping fast, iterating in public, and building things that solve real problems. Most of my work is in Go and TypeScript, focused on backend systems, AI agents, and developer tooling.
